duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain proficient knowledge of EDC functionality for training, change proposals, and user acceptance testing.
Establish and maintain relationships with site data & regulatory coordinators.
Responsible for Quality Control of submitted Case Report Forms (CRFs) and issuing queries.
Act as an Evaluator for the internal Clinical Research Coordinator in training, providing extensive feedback to the trainee.
Maintain regulatory documentation for all assigned sites and study staff.
Perform QC audits of the clinical database.
Support and adhere to Good Clinical Practices (GCP) guidelines, FDA, IRB, and HIPPA regulations.
Work closely with onsite team to ensure appropriate consenting is performed and documented prior to data abstraction.
Communicate effectively with the research team, investigator(s), study sponsor, and ancillary staff.
